website_summaries.verdict: A conveniently small waterproof HD action camera that works as an excellent underwater companion for short video and spontaneous adventures.
pros: The remote control is a convenient and adds a great dynamic
Works really well during underwater excursions
The camera case can withstand pressure and go up to 30 meters deep
The built-in wifi works well and the free iSmart DV app allows users to view, download, and record video directly from their phone
cons: Recording is only in mp4 format
Not ideal for monitoring fish while fishing, better for recording video
Battery life doesn’t last as long as some may like
Lacks quality low light and night recording

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this camera a better review but I just can't. Camera came with 2 batteries, charged up both batteries. went to use the video and the first battery only lasted 5 minutes, installed 2nd battery and that battery lasted only 15 minutes. Charged up the 1st battery and tried to use it again and it would not even turn the camera. At this point I just gave up on this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bogert

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can connect this camera to your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can connect this camera to your phone and see what is on the screen and also export videos to your phone. was well worth the value of not buying a go pro! I cant wait to use it in the winter where i live
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Saves video uncompressed, 2-3 hours of footage is 20+GBs ...
customer_reviews.text: Saves video uncompressed, 2-3 hours of footage is 20+GBs. Compression would cost battery life, so thats a compromise, especially at this price point. The battery door is extremely fragile and I have one broken. (bought 2 cameras). When inside the case, the battery now wiggles loose and turns off the camera. Doesnt appear to be any way to fix or replace this. I have tried to glue some plastic to the outside of the battery to compensate, but then those batteries do not work in the other camera. If they shipped 2 or 3 spare battery doors with each camera it would be a different story.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, Compatible with Well Known Brand Name Units
customer_reviews.text: Bough this as I wanted to avoid buying the big name brand version. The reviews sold me on the quality. Used it for a Veteran's Honor Flight event in The Villages, FL. Fantastic quality 4K video in a variety of lighting and temperature conditions. I had no problem going from air conditioned space to 95 degrees Florida summer sun and humidity. I was not able to download the 4K video to my laptop but my MAC at work handled it fine. Very pleased with it and look forward it to being in my arsenal of tools to shoot video in my business. Loved the wide angle to show the venues we were in saluting these honored Veterans.
customer_reviews.author: Video Doc

customer_reviews.title: Light action camera....see what I did there ;)
customer_reviews.text: One bad ass action camera. For the price, GoPr0 has some serious competition. The video is really really and smooth. I would have posted a video but, I accidentally smudged the lens with with sunscreen for most of the shot. Here's what I like about the camera: Intuitive, great resolution, compatible with my other "GoPr" attachments, photos are just as great, comes with a million accessories, has extra batteries, and the main reason i bought it.....it has a remote. What i don't like. It's not a touch screen like my other GoPr....but for the price who cares lol.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chang

customer_reviews.title: capture your moments
customer_reviews.text: Had great success with this action camera. I was skeptical at first because it was cheaper than others that I looked up but I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of videos and pictures. The camera comes with all the attachments needed for whatever you are going to do. I was able to use it with my full underwater face mask. Snapped right on. Battery life of this camera is pretty good and comes with a extra battery with a seemed like a 3 to 4 hour charge time per battery. I highly recommend and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Close

customer_reviews.title: Just like a GoPro but at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing with this camera all day and it works really well so far. Some time ago I bought a small GoPro without the screen, and it was always kind of difficult to use. What I like about this camera is that the screen is very clear, the battery lasts a long time, the buttons are very responsive and it only costed a fraction of the price compared to a GoPro. I comes with a bunch of accessories, except an SD Card, you have to buy it separately. Other that that it is a very complete product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: A good value but images were a bit on the grainy ...
customer_reviews.text: A good value but images were a bit on the grainy side despite the high pixel count. The white balance can be tricky and images tend to be under exposed. Adjusting exposure up tends to overexpose. Needs to have better auto-exposure. On plus side, the WiFi connectivity to a smartphone is very nice. Tons of fittings and accessories included. Certainly, no need to spend $300 on a competing brand.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this camera as a gift for someone. I have an original GoPro Hero with no screen or wifi. After helping set up this Crosstour for my friend and showing them how to use it, I loved it so much I sold my GoPro and bought one of these for myself. The remote shutter works great, even when the screen is off due to the screensaver. Using the wifi and connecting my phone to it works great. With that app I can download or delete files without needing to remove the SD card or connect to a computer.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyJJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and price. Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is pretty darn awesome and the quality of video is amazing. For the price, this camera is perfect for any adventurer looking to document your trips and activities. I bought this camera to take mountain biking and love all the different mounts and attachments that come with it. The only negative thing I have to say is I wish it supported a larger SD card (more than 32GB). Other than that, I’m glad I stumbled across this camera because there was no way I’m spending hundreds of dollars for a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but mediocre batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera yesterday. I charged for two hours with the battery that came with it. Then I recorded for 5 minutes. The battery died. I switched the battery and charged for two hours. I recorded again, the battery lasted for 6 minutes. I connected the camera to pc and it connected well. The quality of video was excellent. The only drawback is the battery does not last for more than 6 minutes. Both batteries are defective, hence two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Geek

customer_reviews.title: I have a Hero3 and came onto Amazon looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Hero3 and came onto Amazon looking for a remote control, which was about $70. While searching, I came across this unit which not only came with a remote, but also had an LCD viewing screen, all for less than the GoPro remote itself. So what rhe heck, I bought it. My issue is not rhe camera itself but the waterproof housing. There is this thin film that covers the lense (not rhe protective wrapping) that got knicked so I had to peel it off, whiich lett a gluey residue that was very difficult to clear off. Due to the remaining haze, the housing is unusable in sunlight but okay in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bravo.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, I love the internet. I saw an article on some tech website saying there was a GoPro alternative under $100 with 5 star ratings and whether I was gonna buy it or not I had to check it out. I read through the features and descriptions, several customer reviews and I went for it. Too good of a deal to pass up, even if the product wasn't top quality. It may not be a GoPro, but it gets the job done all the same and for a fraction of the price. AND 4K?! FOR THAT PRICE?!
customer_reviews.author: Josh&Sterlz

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality even at 1080 60fps
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great just leave it on 16mp but great, the video on 1080 at 60fps is very nice and clean when transferred to your phone (easy process), it’s a great quality camera and sound is good. The only problem I have is that if you turn the camera off too often it will overwrite some videos you have on and you won’t be able to view them also the battery life is horrible but thank god this comes with two batteries
customer_reviews.author: Siramid

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. Even the Geeks tried. No response from manufacturer for support.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the thing to work. Several of us tried. Contacted the manufacturer. Sent PDF of manual as requested but did not respond to email for support. Also second battery included was not for this camera. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Blahsan

customer_reviews.title: I specifically looked for action cameras that were not too expensive so this product is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because for my last ski trip, I only had my cellphone to capture video and photos and that did not go well. I specifically looked for action cameras that were not too expensive so this product is perfect for me. When I received it, I was surprised that there were more accessories included than I expected. So I took it for a test and the pics with the snow are certainly within my expectations. Some pictures I took with the camera are attached.
customer_reviews.author: KB_NYC

customer_reviews.title: This camera is AWESOME! I use it interchangebly with my gopro Hero ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is AWESOME! I use it interchangebly with my gopro Hero 3+ and can barely tell the difference. Make sure you turn up the resolution and adjust the settings when you get it. The remote is an awesome touch! I have this mounted on the hood of my jeep, and I can control it from inside! AND I can see the back LCD screen. which is better than my gopro that doesnt have one.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDad1000

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: GUYS İT İS NOT GOOD. İT İS NOT AN ACTİON CAMERA. DOES NOT WORK WİTH MOTORCYCLE. DO NOT LOOK TOO MANY PEOPLE BOUGHT THAT İT İS NOT GOOD CAMERA. İ purchase this camera because of safety. But yhis camera always stuck. Always skipping some montşon. Too bad . İt is DİSSAPPOİNTED. There is bo sd memory card! Also need buy one micro card.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry xu

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for a good camera to captured my liltle girl naughtiness everytime we outside. I been doing live videos but still not good captured as this action camera.. good thing i found this online and fit with my budget... so happy i took the risk to buy this.. its easy to install and easy to use.. just need the micro sd and your good to go...
customer_reviews.author: Julieth

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is nice, the accessories you get with this make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera works really well. I got it as a beginner cam to see how much I would use one before buying a more expensive one. Image quality is nice, the accessories you get with this make it even a better deal. I have plenty of ways to use this cam right out of the box without investing more money into an action cam setup. You will need a 32 gig class 10 memory card to use any video settings higher than 1080p(30fps).
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I was able to use it while going snorkeling in Hawaii with no trouble. It came with all kinds of attachments that I was able to use on my snorkeling mask as well as my selfie stick. It took very nice underwater pictures, as well as above water pictures, along with nice videos. Very pleased. It does take a mini SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McCormick

customer_reviews.title: VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale for $30 at Christmas, use it for filming snowboarding. It does a great job for the price and it has a lot of accessories. I sprung for two extra 1350maH batteries and charging station and it still was under $45. I rated the image stabilization at 2 stars because it isn't advertised as having any. However, I found the shots to still look relatively smooth for having no stabilization. I will buy another, possibly two at those prices.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's actually very good 4k camera for its price. I was always thinking that camera should cost around GoPro price tag of $450, but this camera is giving same features but cost is much better. It also comes with all sorts of accessories you can imagine. Surpirsed though that there were no SDcard. Because i have a lot it's not an issue, but you probably want to order SDcard at the same time with camera to avoid waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am pleasantly surprised on how well this takes video and photos. Everything is very clear and there is virtually every attachment you would ever need plus two rechargable batteries. After playing around with it I bought 4 more to give my adult kids for a Christmas kid. They all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This tiny camera is amazing! the quality of the photos is impressive, for my amateur needs as sport activities, short videos and City touring. The range of attachments that are included in the pack will allow people to make their own combination to secure their device either onto a snorkel mask, a cycle helmet etc. A reasonable price Great customer service takes your business to the next level, and ensure your success. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ronen Rick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, But I guess that's what I deserve for $65
customer_reviews.text: Simply, the product does not record video or capture photos in the quality that it describes. The photos are very low resolution and the video is closer to 480p than 4K. I knew I was taking a risk and thought it probably wasn't as good as described. Unfortunately that was true. The packaging and included accessories are nice and the camera seems to be very well build, which gave me a lot of hope when first opening the package. But even after trying to fix the video in post it is unusable. I was hoping for even half of the quality of a GoPro and that was not met.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera for the price.  Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: For such a cheap camera, this thing has incredibly clear picture and a very nice setup. The waterproof case is very well designed and works perfectly and all the accessories that it comes with are easy to use and of very hi quality. When we ordered this camera we didn't really know what to expect, but we are very happy with the result. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: I snorkeled with turtles on a few occasions and was disappointed to find I couldn't see them at all
customer_reviews.text: So far is done what is supposed to and maybe I'm doing something wrong but the underwater photos have been too blurry to be able to see. I snorkeled with turtles on a few occasions and was disappointed to find I couldn't see them at all. Again, this could very well be user error and the camera has held up nicely and taking pictures great while above water :)
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old asked for a Go Pro for Christmas, but I couldn’t justify spending that amount on a camera he will potentially break. He requested it for mainly outdoor use. It takes great pictures and video! Super easy to use and upload images to the computer!! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for a while and it's really good. Just sucks at focus (which I dont think it has that) but the wide screen is awesome. But be warned. To save battery the screen will turn automatically. Dont know why. Pictures are average, video is a 4.2 out if 5 in light. 2.1 out of 5 in darker areas. You can fit 64gb for 6 hours of video time. Take advantage of that. I wish it had more addons options.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: not a real gopro but works
customer_reviews.text: works for about an hour and using 4k could cause it to overheat during those hot summer days. Also using 4k kills battery life significantly. 720p or less i would suggest if u want this to run for several hours and at the absolute lowest power settings.
customer_reviews.author: blairlake24

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera with cool slow mo features
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera with cool slow mo features. I've used this to make some nice slow mo videos of my knife tricks. Not as good as the GoPros I've played with before but really good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice camrea
customer_reviews.text: The Ct9000 action camera appears to be a good camera for the price. The camera was packaged well and arrived in good condition. I used the camera for a couple days around the house and out side. The camera takes good photos and the 1080 60fps video looks good. The camera is easy to use and setup. The remote control works well with the camera and is a neat option. The phone app connected easily to my iPhone and works well. The sound quality is little on the low side but I purchased the camera to use underwater so it should not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the money you spend
customer_reviews.text: Worth for money spent. I was looking for a action cam for quiet sometime, but really not ready to spend $200 for it. I came across Crosstour action camera 1080 version, but I thought remote would be helpful, so selected this version and remote is really helpful when you are doing some activity. Audio is so clear even when you are using it in the water proof case. Wi-Fi works without any issue. I was able to download the videos using Wi-Fi mode. It was delivered within 15 hours from the time of order. So I was able to take it to my Mexico trip on the next day. Overall, fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Phx_Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good: It works. Bad: Somewhat clumsy to navigate the menus. Worst part is that every time the battery dies, it resets the time. All of my videos taken in 2018 are dated June of 2017. Unless of course, every time you change the battery, you want to navigate through their bulky menu and reset the clock again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tong

customer_reviews.title: What a Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the mounts and hardware. Comes with two batteries and a manual, all of which are helpful. It's also super affordable. I don't go out and do enough stuff to warrant spending the money on a gopro but I do enough that I could benefit from one, and benefit I have. This action camera has a screen which I really like too!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this is a great buy! Two batteries
customer_reviews.text: Will get a chance to test it out soon on our cruise, and can give additional star then. But simply based on customer support and packaging itself... this is a great buy! Two batteries, many attachment options, remote wristband! Mounted to snorkel mask with ease and can’t wait to take pictures of all the fish in the Caribbean!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Smith

customer_reviews.title: My bad for not researching it a little bit more but ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Would not connect to Wi-Fi. And the accessory clips are cheaply made and will not last long. My bad for not researching it a little bit more but there is no image stabilization so it's not the best camera for action sports.
customer_reviews.author: bearded fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but MIGHTY
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and the opportunity I​ had to use it on our vacation. It stands the test of the kayak in Catalina, riding bikes, taking it on roller coasters in Sea world and my 13 year took it while going in the ocean and boarding. This is def worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Myer

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this company was fantastic, I had questions and they responded back with ...
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this company was fantastic, I had questions and they responded back with answers right away. I got this product for my upcoming vacation to Hawaii to go snorkeling. I am really looking forward to it. I plan on going out hiking this weekend and taking pictures and videos to get up to par on the working of the camera. Can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: it didn’t fall out of the mount or anything and the photo and video quality were both really good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself when I travel to other countries and go diving or something but my son rode around the neighborhood with it attached to his bike just to play with it. It took the bumps really well, it didn’t fall out of the mount or anything and the photo and video quality were both really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't like formatting micro SD cards
customer_reviews.text: Essentially worthless. By the time I had a chance to try it, I found that it does nothing but "card errors." Maybe spend more and get a real one. Accessories are very cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: john d

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressive
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality of this Action Camera, it’s worth more than 5 stars! I had to do a video to show how awesome it looks! Looks super expensive and it came with so much accessories. My daughter was super stunned when she tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Camera is junk. Batteries last about 10 minutes. Video quality is that of a 5 year old smartphone. Don't waste your money. At the end of the day, what do you expect for an "Action Camera" under $50. Better off buying a newer model used Android smartphone and just using its camera function. Better results from that for sure.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera a little over a month ago to record video under water. My daughter was just able to try it out in our pool. The "waterproof" case is not airtight and the lens became foggy. So I thought I could use to make regular videos (not under water) and that doesn't work either because the microphone doesn't record sound very well (very low volume). Overall I would not buy again, looking now for a better all around camera. And of course since it's over 30 days I cannot return it through Amazon. Crosstour can you help me?
customer_reviews.author: bryan24

customer_reviews.title: For those that want to capture everything, but don’t pretend to be a Pro!
customer_reviews.text: All bells and whistles included. As good as a GoPro in my mind. Took it to the beach and to some ruins. The 4K is very good. Functions take a bit to navigate. But all in all, a good value!
customer_reviews.author: TFt

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing with this for a couple of days and it takes nice pictures and video. Comes with a bunch of attachments to mount to anything from a bicycle to a helmet and the wifi function is easy to use and works great. Took the attached photos on a job site and the detail is very good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gloyd

customer_reviews.title: This was a great first step into the sports camera community
customer_reviews.text: My significant other and I have been using this camera since the end of 2017 and we absolutely love it. We take lots of hikes and enjoy being outside so we are able to share a unique vantage point by taking pictures using the telescoping mount. The battery life is fantastic as we go weeks without charging it. The photos are able to be shared directly with your smartphone by connecting to a provate wifi signal which is very convenient when we want to share them with our family on the go. Wonderful product. I would 10/10 reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome and comes with all the accessories you could ever need. I bought it for my trip snowboarding. Not too much snow, so no snowboarding :(, but took some pretty pictures and videos in the car. They came out super clear which is crazy for such a tiny little gadget. Super impressed and great little buy. I can’t wait to use on my trip to Cancun and use snorkeling and on the water slides. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Biascan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture/video quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for both videos and pictures. My wife loves it so much because her iPhone pictures are always blurry. The camera itself is very light weight and easy to carry. The WiFi feature makes files transferring simple too.
customer_reviews.author: Amorix

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girls trip to Hawaii. Sadly, it wouldn’t hold a charge. I returned it for my money. My friend also bought the same one from the same seller and it worked fine. So, obviously mine was defective. Advice, if you buy charge it well in advance before your event to make sure it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s dead!
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture....... it did not survive the hot summer days. I found it totally deformed and no longer functional. The unit melted in the hot summer heat in the car.
customer_reviews.author: N2PKB

customer_reviews.title: Best clarity pictures and videos for very reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this small gadget! Amazing picture quality, videos we took with this device were awesome. It is worth it and I felt much more cheaper than gopro but the quality is better or equal to the same! I am very thankful for this camera. It came with so many different attachments and they all function very well!
customer_reviews.author: JANKI

customer_reviews.title: Picture image is great
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to be so tiny but after turning it on I was very impressed with the image and quality of the picture. My only concern is that there are a lot of extras that came with it and no instructions. I am looking forward to using this next week when I am in Belize and go snorkeling..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this as an option instead of the overrated go pro I decided to give it a shot. I was skeptical but this little camera works really well, the resolution is pretty decent and the app is awesome. I connected to my phone via WiFi and was able to record and watch they my phone, super cool!! If you are a beginner or just wanna give a cool gift and not break the bank this is the camera for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera records ok. The problem is the mounting fell off from my brothers helmet after a few months. But that can be resolved with other double sided tape. The camera itself is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Clecia

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two new batteries thinking the original was bad and charge all batteries to 100%
customer_reviews.text: I only used the Camera twice first time it recorded well 2nd time it only recorded 3 seconds of video and shut down. the battery was fully charged. I ordered two new batteries thinking the original was bad and charge all batteries to 100%. Camera came on for a second and shut back down. now it won't come on at all. All batteries are charged to 100% and tested with multi meter. Camera is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl R Luna

customer_reviews.title: So far this camera is great. I got it for a Vlog we are ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera is great. I got it for a Vlog we are in the process of making. I am pleasantly surprised by it, it came with all the attachments, and for the price, I am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Maturing in Christ

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, bad M3 tape
customer_reviews.text: The camera was decent for the price. I had no issues with its functionality or its quality. If you're going to use it as a motorcycle helmet do not trust the sticky M3 tape it gives you. On my second ride it fell off my helmet on the freeway and is now lost forever.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cool little action camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cool little action camera for the price. Worked flawlessly underwater and I'm about to attach it to a hobby-level drone. Lots of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: P. Graff

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to take on my daughters senior trip. We took well over 400 pictures and 20 videos on a 16mb card and had a lot of space left! The photos came out great. The video was good, not great, but I didnt expect it to be. Very pleased with this camera. The battery life lasted a good while too. The only complaint is that and not really a complaint, just something I will have to remember, after you turn it on, you have to push the power button again to get it to camera mode. It turns on as video mode.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great surprise! Came with so many accessories and parts! It works just as well as some big name products for a much lower price. Very happy to find that the camera and app were both very easy to use and it didn't take long to get it set up. I will recommend this camera to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Posh.Palmer

customer_reviews.title: This gadget is so awesome! My toddler son has been taking swim lessons ...
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is so awesome! My toddler son has been taking swim lessons and I wanted to capture what it looks like under water when he is swimming. The videos and pictures are clear and easy to upload.
customer_reviews.author: honeybadger

customer_reviews.title: No User Manual available online to download
customer_reviews.text: Manual difficult to read because of type size and use of minimal ink. And there is no User Manual in PDF form online
customer_reviews.author: Dick

customer_reviews.title: works great, really good crisp clear video and sound
customer_reviews.text: used it for the first time - kayaking / fishing.. works great, really good crisp clear video and sound.. so far, I am very happy with this product...specially for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Potter

customer_reviews.title: Action camera as Trailer backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little video action camera. Can't believe how many accessories are included. I have a fairly new trailer and will also be able to use the camera as a backup camera using the wifi connection on video mode and simply attaching the camera to the rear bumper. I'm sure I'll find many uses for this nifty little device.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Did not leak on test run
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Took it for try before going on vacation. Camera box did not leak. Only dislike that i have, is when swapping batteries time and date has to be reset each time. A simple built in button cell battery would fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: alex stelly

customer_reviews.title: Why not
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Go Pro but could not bring myself to spend the cash. This thing works great.
customer_reviews.author: kevin goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive quality camera
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive camera to capture really nice videos. Have taken it to family vacations and on my MTB on chest strap. The phone app is really helpful to capture photos and to set up when taking videos. All that being said it is not equal to a $300 action camera, but it performs way better than expected for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Jardin

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great package for a great price during the lightning sale
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and great package for a great price during the lightning sale. Easy to use, didn't need the manual to figure out the menus.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Mike

customer_reviews.title: Be Wary! Low quality means you're taking a risk, it might work great for you, or it might be a complete waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 3 of my videos captured were corrupt and could not be played back. Left it plugged in and charging overnight, next day it started up with 60% battery and only lasted ~30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The wrist band should have lights to show if it ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrist band should have lights to show if it is on or off. It is used on a helmet and it can not be seen if it is recording unless I take the helmet off.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Video, Poor Battery
customer_reviews.text: Great still photos Great clear video Poor audio capture Battery life extremely poor. Maybe that's why It includes 2 batteries. Too bad
customer_reviews.author: John Mckenney

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Super solid camera. I was surprised because its not a gopro but man it works easy and has a very solid feel to it. picture is good and the camera itself is very handy. I like that it comes with lots of accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jessen

customer_reviews.title: Recording quality is good and so far battery life has been over an ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. A less expensive alternative. Recording quality is good and so far battery life has been over an hour of recording time, per battery. I have tested the camera mounted to the front of my motorcycle. Heat (summer riding) and vibration have not damaged anything. I will update if I run into any problems in the future. Quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved this camera and is already using and enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this camera and is already using and enjoying it. We looked on Youtube to find out how to use it and the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Mid American Dreamers

customer_reviews.title: Thing has been great for vacation use
customer_reviews.text: Thing has been great for vacation use! I don't see much difference from this to my friend GoPro Hero 4. Except for the price! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for a fraction of the price of a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: The camera is amazing, I have used it on my motorcycle, climbing a waterfall and diving. It's worth every penny. I would recommend it and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good camera. The sound is sketchy, but the video seems good. I am trying photos, too. Seem good there as well. I wish I could get a red filter for it.
customer_reviews.author: HotDigittyDog

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good camera
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried it yet, but appears to be a great little camera for kids without spending the money for a GoPro. Review written for a free gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Braff

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made little camera, go pro has nothing on her.👌battery life is not great but they sale extra batterys.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. I like it. I am very impressed with it’s image and quality. The camera itself fits in the palm with the good case on it. It comes with full of action accessories. It is 4K and WiFi compatible.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera - Say Goodbye GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it had the ability to do continuous loop recording.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Amos

customer_reviews.title: Missing batteries
customer_reviews.text: I receive my camera today. Went to set it up and low and behold no batteries in the package. I’m leaving for vacation with no camera really upset!! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about action cameras. This one was easy to set up. I took it rafting and it did well. The pictures and videos turned out well. Although I do wish it came with a guide on how to mount it to different things. I definitely think is was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I still cannot believe all you get for this money. Great value. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, the only complaint that I have is not being able to turn of the sounds the camera makes when powering up. Not good for hunting, but many other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations when purchasing this camera due to the price, but I am pretty happy with it. I've always wanted a GoPro but never wanted to spend that kind of money. For the price, the quality of this camera is great and it comes with all the mounting accessories, an extra battery, and a wireless remote; which is nice to have on my wrist or bag when doing activities like fishing, hiking, or hunting.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, great price, high quality action camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use and takes amazing videos. The box comes with a ton of accessories, batteries etc. Crosstour has great battery life, I can’t wait to travel with it next month!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Shitrit

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, very easy to use. Love that there is an app where you can download your pictures right onto your phone as well as use the camera right off the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R. Zipperer

customer_reviews.title: Looks, then price
customer_reviews.text: Great video! Ease of use. Would have liked a better way to secure it to my mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great size and overall quality
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps, it’s my age, but there are way too many adapter parts for me to make sense of. Left most of them in the box. Handy and good quality...
customer_reviews.author: Parrot 64

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago and I use it all the time. Takes great pictures and comes with backup batteries for extended hours.
customer_reviews.author: Okay thanks

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these cameras and they have been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Would buy as gift
customer_reviews.text: Not sure for others but I really liked this product and mine worked under water. I didn’t want to spend a crazy amount for a product I only use on occasional vacations I go to. This is product is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Great bundled camera with great features!
customer_reviews.text: Was wanting a camera to take to Alaska with me, but didn't want the expense of the "name brand" one. Thought I'd give this one a shot. What a nice surprise when all of the advertised features work so great. Great Camera, great bundle!
customer_reviews.author: syber

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam with cool features..
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, cool features. The size of the palm of your hand.. I tried it as a dashcam the other day. And I really liked the results. Can't wait to try it underwater....
customer_reviews.author: Chen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, money worth spent
customer_reviews.text: Great product, money worth spent. It’s waterproof and the quality of the picture is just about right. Easy access in a motion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: With this camera you can view video and pictures while ...
customer_reviews.text: With this camera you can view video and pictures while you film or take photographs.some of the go pro cameras don’t have this option.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Battle

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera for the $
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. Haven't used it yet but it appears pretty simple to use and, other than the battery door, looks to be pretty sturdy. Would have liked a little more information related to the included accessories. Looking forward to using it during an upcoming outdoor adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sutton

product_meta.title: Crosstour 4K Action Camera 16MP WiFi Underwater Cam 30M Waterproof Case Sports Camera with Remote Control 2 Batteries and 19 Mounting Accessories (Big Sales for One Week)
feature_bullets: 4K 16MP ACTION CAMERA - Crosstour Ultra HD 4K camera features rich video resolution options, including professional 4K(25fps), 2.7K(30fps) and 1080P(60fps) for your preference. 16 MP photo resolution ensure better photo clarity when compared to the 12 MP cameras. Crosstour offers a 6 layer optical glass lens capturing more vivid colorful photos and videos.

WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL - You have total control of your camera with the easy to use remote control with a red button for photo taking and gray button for video recording. A very convenient option for taking photos or videos on selfie sticks.

30M UNDERWATER CAMERA - The waterproof IP68 material case (included) means you can scuba dive up to 98.4ft. The case offers protection when you are recording in the snow, rain or underwater( diving, skiing, surfing).

BUILT-IN Wi-Fi SPORTS CAM - With Wi-Fi connected, the camera is completely under your control in "iSmart DV" APP. You can see what is displaying in camera without delay. Resolution setting, video recording, files deleting can be all realized. You are able to share your happiness to social medias.

2 LONG LIFE CAMERA BATTERIES - Equipped with two pieces rechargeable 1050mAh batteries, one battery can record up to 90 minutes. In addition, most of the camera accessories can work with gopro. It is recommended to use a Micro SD card class 10 no more than 32GB (not included).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars458 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
